claim_evidence: a weighted context-free transduction of reasonable quality can be effectively learned from examples
evidence: Existing studies show that a weighted context-free transduction of reasonable quality can be effectively learned from examples .
text: Existing studies show that a weighted context-free transduction of reasonable quality can be effectively learned from examples .

claim: context-free transduction has a relatively high accuracymay be difficult to obtain robustness without further increasing the time costs
text: For our application , context-free transduction has a relatively high accuracy , but it also has a high time consumption , and it may be difficult to obtain robustness without further increasing the time costs .
